sentences.sContent: I remember reading a book somewhere – it said that almost all of us are waiting for something.
sentences.sContent_eng: I remember reading a book somewhere – it said that almost all of us are waiting for something.
sentences.sCn: 我记得在哪里读过一本书--- 书上说我们大部分人都一直在等待着什么。

sentences.sContent: They want their online experience to be simple and straightforward, like reading a book or newspaper!
sentences.sContent_eng: They want their online experience to be simple and straightforward, like reading a book or newspaper!
sentences.sCn: 他们更希望在线体验能够尽量简单和直观，就像阅读一本书或一份报纸一样！

sentences.sContent: If you are reading a book and no longer feel that you get enough value from it, then stop reading it.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you are reading a book and no longer feel that you get enough value from it, then stop reading it.
sentences.sCn: 如果你正在读一本书，但是再也感觉不到你能从中获得足够的价值，请停止阅读。
